subject: Re: Using System.out.println("something") ???
msgSnippet: ... logger (log4J, ... What would you log? Or what is recommended to log? We want to use logging but we have no idea what we should log in JUnit tests. Are
messageBody:
> - you would like to have a println in your production code, use a
logger (log4J,
> commons-logging) instead

What would you log?

Or what is recommended to log?

We want to use logging but we have no idea what we should log in
JUnit tests.

Are there general ideas?
